description:
Computer Programming Has Never Been Easier!

Now you can start learning how to code in Python, with an easy and entertaining method of fast learning! Take advantage of one of the most powerful, effective and intuitive programming languages ever! Python is extremely simple to learn, yet very powerful! That is why so many big players like Google, Yahoo, Dropbox and even NASA are using it!

The course covers the following topics:

  • Installing and Setting Up the Development Environment
  • Basic Computer Programing Concepts
  • Processing Strings and Simple Arithmetic
  • Creating Your Own Functions
  • Organizing Your Information into Data Structures
  • Working with External Files on Your Hard Disk
  • Accessing Data on the Internet
  • and Much More!

Once you are taking this course, you will see just how easy computer programming can be! You will soon realize it is certainly not as complicated as you once thought.

For this class you don't even need to download, install or set up any software - we are going to use an online code editor for python.

Join our class RIGHT NOW! Make your first steps towards becoming a coding guru!
title: Learn Programming with Python
